page.title: 17THE ARTS IN DIDCOT
page.content: ALL THE ARTS ARE CATERED FOR IN DIDCOT (ALTHOUGH TOO MANY PEOPLE COMPLAIN THAT 'NOTHING EVER HAPPENS'):THE ART CLUB HOLDS OCCASIONAL PAINTING SESSIONS AND DEMONSTRATIONS AND AN ANNUAL EXHIBITION;DIDCOT ARTS AND COMMUNITY ASSOCIATION AIMS TO PROMOTE THE ARTS AT THE NORTHBOURNE CENTRE,HOLDING AN ANNUAL ARTS WEEK;ADULT EDUCATION CLASSES INCLUDE PAINTING, CALLIGRAPHY AND COLLAGE ;THERE IS A CAMERA CLUB, A FLOWER CLUB AND AN ORGAN CLUB;DICOT CHORAL SOCIETY PERFORMS CLASSICAL WORKS AND ORGANIZES THE TOWN CAROL CONCERT;DRAMA GROUPS INCLUDE THE BROADWAY PLAYERS, DOMINO PLAYERS,AND PHOENIX PLAYERS- THE LAST ARE BASED AT THE CIVIC HALL AND PLAY 4 PRODUCTIONS A YEAR,INCLUDING A PANTOMIME; THERE IS A SCHOOL OF DANCING FOR ROYAL ACADEMY EXAMS. AND COACHING IN MODERN DANCE. CONT.
